headline: The Vassal Team is happy to announce the release of Vassal {{version}}.
important: If you are using MacOS 14, please ensure you are using 14.4 or later, to avoid a bug in MacOS which prevents Vassal from starting.

Modules saved in {{version_feature}} are not openable by earlier versions of Vassal. We recommend keeping a backup copy of any pre-{{version_feature}} modules you plan to modify in {{version_feature}} until you've verified that everything works to your satisfaction.
Things may be broken which worked previously. If you find a new bug, please report it.

bug_fixes.desc: At-Start Stack positioning tool now expands prototypes before displaying piece
Ensure a GKC is never applied to same piece twice if it moves
Fix Invisibility documentation
Fix NPE When editing Game Piece Images
Coerce Regular Expression operator arguments to be strings to prevent Bad Data errors
Auto-attach does not attach to self when piece is added to a stack
Fixed bad link to GamePiece page in Reference Manual
Preserve all attachments across save/load
Ensure OldMat is set when a piece leaves a Mat

other_improvements.desc: Report I/O Errors during Predefined Setup refresh in Refresher log, not as a Vassal bug
Improve Save and Load times by ignoring empty Stacks
Add a visual validator for Prototype name in Prototype trait

bug_fixes.desc: Fix typoed condition in Hideable introduced during PMD updates

new_features.desc: Add pieceCount to the map auto reporter

bug_fixes.desc: Fix missing Player list after online game request

other_improvements.desc: Upgrade bundled Java to 21.0.3 (32-bit Windows), 22.0.1 (everything else)

bug_fixes.desc: Prevent crash after saving blank parameter list in GKC
Corrected spelling of Editor.BeanShell.regex key
Don't fail when replaying older log from module version with more Special Dice defined
Update Labels on remote maps after Drag and Drop
Ensure side selection always appears in Wizard
Prevent Area of Effect getting stuck ON when migrating to 3.7

other_improvements.desc: Upgrade bundled Java to Java 22 (except for Windows x86_32, which stays at Java 21)

bug_fixes.desc: Mouse-over viewer to respect Show Unrotated for Cargo on rotated Mats
Improved error catching and reporting when importing XML files into Editor
Prevent ArrayIndexOutOfBounds during search
Prevent NPE when cut/paste List Scenario Property
Game Piece Layer controls cannot be disabled by a property
Remove counters from Zone Count correctly when moving to Stack on another Map
Send to Location option should not appear in Preferences > General section of Reference Manual
SumRange function missing options in Expression Builder
Update Game Piece Layers updated correctly by Set Piece Property
